amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for urban parks and recreation grant programs by $4 million and reduces funding for the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no, 8 and printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for urban parks and recreation grant programs by $4 million and reduce funding for the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands accordingly.

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. George Miller.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
